dct_title_s: An improved topographical map of the northern & middle mines
dct_alternative_sm: Map of the northern and middle mines
dct_description_sm: by M. Milleson, Cl. Engineeer ; engraved by H. Steinegger.
Relief shown by hachures and spot heights
Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Includes legend at lower left corner.
Shows topography, drainage, county boundaries, cities and towns, ranchos, public houses, bars, railroads, routes, e.g.: Carson Route.
"Entered according to Act of Congress in the Year 1854 by Alex. Zakreski in the Clerks Office of the Destreict Court of the United States for the Northern District of the State of California."
"For sale at all principal Book-Stores, and at Publisher's Office."
dct_publisher_sm: published & lithd. by Alex. Zakreski, at the Topographical Drawning Office. Cor. Washington & Montgomery,
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Warren Heckrotte Map Collection courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain.  There are no restrictions on use.  If you have questions, please contact the David Rumsey Map Center at rumseymapcenter@stanford.edu.
